summary: The contact owns a 2019 Ford Explorer. The contact stated while driving 60 MPH, the driver’s side roof rail detached from the body of the vehicle. The vehicle was taken to a local dealer where it was diagnosed but not repaired. Upon investigation, the contact associated the failure with NHTSA Campaign Number: 21V316000 (Structure) however, the VIN was not included. The manufacturer was informed of the failure and referred the contact to NHTSA. The failure mileage was approximately 55,000.
